https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/itU0KRWNm98eV2BI8fZfGCITwG7.jpg Sixteen year old Noga is trying to write her speech for ALFI, the Animal-Liberation-Front-Israel, with the help of Lea, an older, true activist. Noga imagines freedom for herself and for all living beings, but in the meantime she is struggling with her own words. ALFI (Shevi)
